data_description.api_key: API key for the EMF service (available in the EMF user portal)
data_description.site_fid: Unique ID of the site (findable in the EMF user portal under site details)
data_description.em_power_grid_entity: The SmartMeter entity measuring grid consumption. Positive value = consumption from the grid.

data_description.base_url: Custom base URL for the EMF service API.
data_description.datapoint_ts_entity: Entity to use for datapoint timestamps if 'entity' mode is selected.
data_description.queue_max_len: Maximum length of the data queue before old entries are discarded.
data_description.queue_max_send_per_tick: Maximum number of entries to send per update tick.
data_description.em_power_consumption_entity: Entity measuring total power consumption (positive = consumption).
data_description.em_power_pv_entity: Entity measuring photovoltaic power production (positive = production).
data_description.em_power_battery_entity: Entity measuring battery power flow (positive = charging).
data_description.em_power_evcharger_entity: Entity measuring EV charger power flow (positive = charging).
data_description.em_power_heatpump_entity: Entity measuring heat pump power flow (positive = heating).
data_description.em_power_bhkw_entity: Entity measuring CHP power flow (positive = production).
data_description.bat_soc_entity: Entity measuring battery state of charge in percent (SOC).
data_description.bat_kwh_remaining_entity: Entity measuring remaining battery capacity in kWh.
